name: PolyMiner
description:
Venture into deep space in a cosmic journey to collect precious rare elements mined from asteroids.

- Pilot five different ships each with a unique combination of tools and attributes
- Use laser blasts, bombs, and ramming attacks to break through asteroids
- Collect elements to refill the ship’s fuel and power its abilities
- Track lifetime stats and top scores across many metrics
- Fly across gorgeously rendered backgrounds, earning bonus fuel at each checkpoint
